org.eclipse.emf.refactor.henshin.runtime
Class HenshinInformationAdapter

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.emf.refactor.henshin.runtime.HenshinInformationAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IHenshinInformation
public abstract class HenshinInformationAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IHenshinInformation

Adapter implementation of the IHenshinInformation interface used for specifying a Henshin file that shall be used by a specific EMF model refactoring.

Author:
Thorsten Arendt
